Docs.summary: The base class for representing command line arguments to a .

Docs.summary: An absolute path of the app.config file or null if not specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseDirectory { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property BaseDirectory As String

Docs.summary: Directory used to resolve relative paths stored in the arguments.
Docs.remarks: Except for paths stored in , all paths stored in the properties of this class are resolved and absolute. This is the directory that relative paths specified on command line were resolved against.

Docs.summary: Hash algorithm to use to calculate source file debug checksums and PDB checksum.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory As String

Docs.summary: Absolute path of the directory to place generated files in, or null to not emit any generated files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetOutputFilePath(string outputFileName) cil managed
Public Function GetOutputFilePath (outputFileName As String) As String

Docs.summary: Returns a full path of the file that the compiler will generate the assembly to if compilation succeeds.
Docs.remarks: The method takes rather than using the value of since the latter might be unspecified, in which case actual output path can't be determined for C# command line without creating a compilation and finding an entry point. VB does not allow to be unspecified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetPdbFilePath(string outputFileName) cil managed
Public Function GetPdbFilePath (outputFileName As String) As String

Docs.summary: Returns a full path of the PDB file that the compiler will generate the debug symbols to if is true and the compilation succeeds.
Docs.remarks: The method takes rather than using the value of since the latter might be unspecified, in which case actual output path can't be determined for C# command line without creating a compilation and finding an entry point. VB does not allow to be unspecified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InteractiveMode { bool get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property InteractiveMode As Boolean

Docs.summary: Drop to an interactive loop. If a script is specified in executes the script first.

Docs.summary: Sequence of absolute paths used to search for key files.

Docs.summary: Resources specified as arguments to the compilation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MetadataReferences As ImmutableArray(Of CommandLineReference)

Docs.summary: References to metadata supplied on the command line. Includes assemblies specified via /r and netmodules specified via /addmodule.

Public ReadOnly Property NoWin32Manifest As Boolean

Docs.summary: If true, do not embed any Win32 manifest, including one specified by or any default manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Collections::Immutable::ImmutableArray<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::String ^>> PathMap { System::Collections::Immutable::ImmutableArray<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::String ^>> get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property PathMap As ImmutableArray(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, String))

Docs.summary: A list of pairs of paths. This stores the value of the command-line compiler option /pathMap:X1=Y1;X2=Y2... which causes a prefix of X1 followed by a path separator to be replaced by Y1 followed by a path separator, and so on for each following pair.
Docs.remarks: This option is used to help get build-to-build determinism even when the build directory is different from one build to the next. The prefix matching is case sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PdbPath { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property PdbPath As String

Docs.summary: Path of the PDB file or null if same as output binary path with .pdb extension.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ PreferredUILang { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property PreferredUILang As CultureInfo

Docs.summary: Specify the preferred output language name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PrintFullPaths { bool get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property PrintFullPaths As Boolean

Docs.summary: If true, prints the full path of the file containing errors or warnings in diagnostics.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReferencePaths As ImmutableArray(Of String)

Docs.summary: Sequence of absolute paths used to search for references.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReportAnalyzer { bool get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property ReportAnalyzer As Boolean

Docs.value: Report additional information related to analyzers, such as analyzer execution time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReportInternalsVisibleToAttributes As Boolean

Docs.summary: Report additional information related to InternalsVisibleToAttributes for all assemblies the compiler sees in this compilation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MetadataReference> ResolveMetadataReferences(class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MetadataReferenceResolver metadataResolver) cil managed

Docs.param: to use for assembly name and relative path resolution.
Docs.summary: Resolves metadata references stored in using given file resolver and metadata provider.

Docs.summary: Absolute path of the .ruleset file or null if not specified.

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourceFiles As ImmutableArray(Of CommandLineSourceFile)

Docs.summary: Source file paths.
Docs.remarks: Includes files specified directly on command line as well as files matching patterns specified on command line using '*' and '?' wildcards or /recurse option.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceLink { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property SourceLink As String

Docs.summary: Path of the file containing information linking the compilation to source server that stores a snapshot of the source code included in the compilation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourcePaths As ImmutableArray(Of String)

Docs.summary: Sequence of absolute paths used to search for sources specified as #load directives.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TouchedFilesPath { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property TouchedFilesPath As String

Docs.summary: Full path of a log of file paths accessed by the compiler, or null if file logging should be suppressed.
Docs.remarks: Two log files will be created: One with path and extension ".read" logging the files read, and second with path and extension ".write" logging the files written to during compilation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Utf8Output { bool get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property Utf8Output As Boolean

Docs.summary: If true, use UTF-8 for output.
